data.text:
Rebecca "Becky" ANDERSON was born on 20 November 1879 in Monroe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. She died on 28 November 1956 at the age of 77 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 30 November 1956 in Bethel Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Elijah Malachi "Lige" ANDERSON and Eliza HAMBLIN.

Spouse: John Henley SIDDEN. Rebecca "Becky" ANDERSON and John Henley SIDDEN were married on 5 March 1902 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Children were: infant SIDDEN, Charles Richard SIDDEN, Mary Elizabeth SIDDEN.

Rebecca A. ANDERSON was born on 15 December 1853 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 15 May 1931 at the age of 77 in Monroe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 17 May 1931 in Austin Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Rev. James Ward ANDERSON and Sarah Elizabeth TONER.

Spouse: John C. CRITCHFIELD. Rebecca A. ANDERSON and John C. CRITCHFIELD were married in 1873. Children were: Robert Ellis "Toad" CRITCHFIELD, Libbie B. CRITCHFIELD.

Rebecca Narcissa ANDERSON was born in 1844. She died in 1924 at the age of 80. She was buried in White Co., Tennessee. Parents: James John ANDERSON Jr. and Nancy Rebecca HILL.

Spouse: Elijah McCamel WILHITE. Rebecca Narcissa ANDERSON and Elijah McCamel WILHITE were married.

Reuben Andrew ANDERSON was born on 11 January 1895 in Sumner Co., Kansas. He died on 8 October 1958 at the age of 63 in Wichita, Sedgwick, Kansas. He was buried in Wichita, Sedgwick, Kansas.

Spouse: Iva Fay GIBBONS. Iva Fay GIBBONS and Reuben Andrew ANDERSON were married on 12 June 1918 in Wichita, Sedgwick, Kansas.

Richard ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert A. ANDERSON and Caroline "Carrie" SALLEE.Richard Dave ANDERSON was born on 1 May 1937 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. He lived in Braymer in 2017.

Parents: Thomas Jefferson "Tommy" ANDERSON Jr. and Juanita Lucreta WILSON.

Spouse: Myrna Dell LITTON. Myrna Dell LITTON and Richard Dave ANDERSON were married in 1957. Children were: Julia Lea ANDERSON.

Richard Davis ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: David "Eddie" ANDERSON and unknown .Richard G. "Rich" ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: James Richard "Jim" ANDERSON and Joyce Jeanette HORN.

Spouse: Angelina . Angelina and Richard G. "Rich" ANDERSON were married.

Richard Gale ANDERSON was born about 1946. Parents: Amos Aaron ANDERSON and Mary Juliet TIMMERMAN.

Spouse: Shirley Arlene JAMES. Shirley Arlene JAMES and Richard Gale ANDERSON were married on 23 June 1967 in Ludlow, Livingston, Missouri. The bride was of Ludlow, the groom of Dawn. Children were: Mark ANDERSON.

Richard H. ANDERSON was born on 16 May 1877 in Monroe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 11 November 1918 at the age of 41 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He was buried in McCoskrie Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He never married. He homesteaded land in Montana. Parents: Elijah Malachi "Lige" ANDERSON and Eliza HAMBLIN.Richard T. ANDERSON was born on 27 November 1927 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 13 October 2000 at the age of 72 in Liberty Hospital, Clay, Missouri. His home was in Chillicothe. He was buried on 17 October 2000 in St. Columban Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He graduated from Dawn High School in 1946. He served in the U. S. Army from 1950 to 1952. Parents: Hugh Patrick ANDERSON III and Inez Della STONE.

Spouse: Mariann Antonette VENNEMAN. Mariann Antonette VENNEMAN and Richard T. ANDERSON were married on 28 November 1967 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri.

Rickie Lee ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Lee Jerald ANDERSON and Delores Mae HUTCHINSON.Robert ANDERSON died before 1923. Parents: William Henderson ANDERSON and Caroline Elizabeth GOODWIN.Robert A. ANDERSON was born on 2 August 1874 in Holt, Clay, Missouri. He died on 20 April 1933 at the age of 58 in Livingston Co., Missouri. He died at his wife's home, six miles northeast of Chillicothe. He was buried in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri.

Spouse: Caroline "Carrie" SALLEE. Caroline "Carrie" SALLEE and Robert A. ANDERSON were married in 1897 in Maryville, Nodaway, Missouri. Children were: William Roy ANDERSON, Richard ANDERSON, Robert Lionel ANDERSON, Clive Virgil ANDERSON, Madeline ANDERSON, Janie May ANDERSON.

Robert Austin "Bob" ANDERSON was born on 9 May 1894 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 4 January 1968 at the age of 73 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried in Hutchison Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Robert Newton ANDERSON and Cornelia Jane "Nealy" MAY.

Spouse: Juanita Ruth BOUDE. Juanita Ruth BOUDE and Robert Austin "Bob" ANDERSON were married. Children were: Virginia E. "Toots" ANDERSON, Bobby Jack ANDERSON, Donald Austin ANDERSON Sr., Allen Oscar "Nick" ANDERSON, Georgia Pearl ANDERSON, Roger S. ANDERSON, Beverly Jeanette ANDERSON, Larry Owen ANDERSON, Sadie Sandra ANDERSON.

Robert E. ANDERSON was born in October 1898 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Walter Herbert ANDERSON and Anna WILLIAMS.Robert J. ANDERSON was born on 23 November 1869. Parents: John Theophilus "Theo" ANDERSON and Martha Elvira LUCAS.Robert Lee ANDERSON was born on 25 August 1867 in Chillicothe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 1 March 1933 at the age of 65 in Bismarck, Burleigh, North Dakota. He was buried in Anderson-Smith Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: James Marion ANDERSON II and Sarah Elizabeth LINVILLE.Robert Leonard "Bob" ANDERSON was born on 24 July 1924 in Lawson, Ray, Missouri. He died on 10 June 2013 at the age of 88 in Lathrop, Clinton, Missouri. He was buried on 13 June 2013 in Lathrop, Clinton, Missouri. Burial was in Converse Cemetery. Bob graduated from Lathrop High School in 1941. He worked as a farmer until 1962 when he started work as a supervisor for the USDA. He retired from this position in 1985. He then worked as a greeter at Wal-Mart for 15 years. He also served as a Lay Speaker for the Methodist Church. Both of these positions brought joy to Bob. He loved visiting with people and people looked forward to seeing Bobâs smile and hearing his kind words. Bob was also a member of Lawson United Methodist Church.

Parents: Farris ANDERSON and Bessie WALKER.

Spouse: Ruby Lucile SPIDLE. Ruby Lucile SPIDLE and Robert Leonard "Bob" ANDERSON were married on 4 July 1948 in Excelsior Springs, Clay, Missouri. The bride was of Excelsior Springs, the groom of Lawson. Children were: Nancy ANDERSON, Thomas "Tom" ANDERSON.

Robert Lionel ANDERSON was born on 13 May 1917 in Missouri. He died on 14 June 2007 at the age of 90. He was buried in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Robert A. ANDERSON and Caroline "Carrie" SALLEE.

Spouse: Mary . Mary and Robert Lionel ANDERSON were married.

Robert Newton ANDERSON was born on 23 October 1859 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 13 March 1932 at the age of 72 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 15 March 1932 in Hutchison Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. He was a son of Osborn Anderson. Parents: Osborn ANDERSON Sr. and Sarah B. DAVIS.

Spouse: Cornelia Jane "Nealy" MAY. Cornelia Jane "Nealy" MAY and Robert Newton ANDERSON were married on 2 December 1886 in Sullivan Co., Missouri. Bride and groom were of Sullivan Co., Missouri. Children were: Osborn Newton ANDERSON, Molly Mason ANDERSON, Fountain Henry "Fount" ANDERSON, Robert Austin "Bob" ANDERSON.

Robert S. "Bob" ANDERSON was born on 25 December 1928 in Blue Mound Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 29 January 2017 at the age of 88. He was buried in Monument, El Paso, Colorado. Parents: Hugh Patrick ANDERSON III and Inez Della STONE.Robert Wilson ANDERSON was born about 1933 in Caldwell Co., Missouri. Parents: Thomas Jefferson "Tommy" ANDERSON Jr. and Juanita Lucreta WILSON.

Spouse: Inez Reve VOYLES. Inez Reve VOYLES and Robert Wilson ANDERSON were married on 26 May 1957 in Braymer, Caldwell, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Braymer.

Rodger ANDERSON died on 21 June 1983.

Spouse: Lela M. BROCKMAN. Lela M. BROCKMAN and Rodger ANDERSON were married on 16 October 1934 in Platte, Charles Mix, South Dakota.

Rodney ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Benjamin ANDERSON and Lucille L. ANDERSON.Roger S. ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Robert Austin "Bob" ANDERSON and Juanita Ruth BOUDE.

Spouse: Mary "Tootie" HIGHSHEW. Mary "Tootie" HIGHSHEW and Roger S. ANDERSON were married. Children were: Bryan Clayton ANDERSON.

Rogers ANDERSON was born in 1912 in Arkansas. Parents: John Preston ANDERSON and Iva Jane WALL.Rollland Vincent ANDERSON was born on 19 September 1878 in Carroll Co., Missouri. He died on 16 December 1932 at the age of 54 in Leslie Twp., Carroll, Missouri. He was buried in Coloma Cemetery, Carroll, Missouri. Parents: William F. ANDERSON and Ellen Louisa STRICKLER.

Spouse: Rosa GROZINGER. Rosa GROZINGER and Rollland Vincent ANDERSON were married.

RoLonda ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Deane Elgin ANDERSON and Laundra Mae BOYER.

Spouse: Rancy FANSHER. RoLonda ANDERSON and Rancy FANSHER were married.

Ronald ANDERSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Betty MANNING. Betty MANNING and Ronald ANDERSON were married.

Ronald Everett ANDERSON was born in 1939 in Chillicothe Twp., Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Everett Wiley ANDERSON and Eugenia Elizabeth COX.Ronald Ray ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: David "Eddie" ANDERSON and unknown .Rosadelle "Rosy" ANDERSON was born on 18 July 1877 in Mooresville, Livingston, Missouri. She died in March 1974 at the age of 96 in Springdale, Washington, Arkansas. Parents: Preston ANDERSON and Margaretta S. SERGEANT.

Spouse: George Washington AARON. Rosadelle "Rosy" ANDERSON and George Washington AARON were married about 1910. Children were: Glynna AARON.

Rose E. ANDERSON was born in October 1862 in Geneva, Ontario, New York. She died on 23 April 1933 at the age of 70 in Victor, Ontario, New York. She was buried in Victor, Ontario, New York.

Spouse: Andrew G. NEWELL. Rose E. ANDERSON and Andrew G. NEWELL were married. Children were: Clara Pierce NEWELL.

Roy L. ANDERSON was born on 24 December 1890 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: John Graves ANDERSON and Carrie Ander ADAMS.Ruby ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Thomas Bryan ANDERSON and Nancy Jane LINVILLE.Ruby R. ANDERSON was born on 11 May 1887 in Livingston Co., Missouri. She died on 29 September 1951 at the age of 64 in Missouri. She was buried in Edgewood Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Thomas Bryan ANDERSON and Martha Matilda STEWART.Ruth ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Donald Austin ANDERSON Sr. and Wanda Delores HOLLOWAY.

Spouse: KEMPF. Ruth ANDERSON and KEMPF were married.

Ruth ANDERSON was born on 27 September 1907 in Green Twp., Livingston, Missouri. She died on 24 May 1997 at the age of 89 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She was buried on 28 May 1997 in Wheeling Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Francis Marion "Frank" ANDERSON and Harriette Matilda GAY.

Spouse: Lonnie Lyle BEAIRD. Ruth ANDERSON and Lonnie Lyle BEAIRD were married on 31 December 1938 in Des Moines, Polk, Iowa.

Ruth ANDERSON was born about 1919.

Spouse: Carmack Andrew "Mack" SPROUSE. Ruth ANDERSON and Carmack Andrew "Mack" SPROUSE were married on 20 April 1946 in Excelsior Springs, Clay, Missouri. Bride and groom were of Chillicothe. Children were: Marie SPROUSE, Gary SPROUSE.

Sadie Sandra ANDERSON was born on 5 June 1950 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. She died on 11 May 2012 at the age of 61 in Independence, Jackson, Missouri. She was buried on 16 May 2012 in Hutchison Cemetery, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Robert Austin "Bob" ANDERSON and Juanita Ruth BOUDE.

Spouse: BRANDT.

Spouse: Gary Dewain GRINDSTAFF. Sadie Sandra ANDERSON and Gary Dewain GRINDSTAFF were married on 12 April 1968 in Chillicothe, Livingston, Missouri. Children were: Gary GRINDSTAFF, Ashley GRINDSTAFF, Victor Owen GRINDSTAFF.

Sally B. ANDERSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Fernando M. LOLLAR. Sally B. ANDERSON and Fernando M. LOLLAR were married on 18 November 1886 in Clinton Co., Missouri. Children were: Willard Hall LOLLAR, Franklin LOLLAR, Roy LOLLAR, Pearl LOLLAR.

Samuel ANDERSON was born about 1832 in New Jersey.

Spouse: Sarah WISE. Sarah WISE and Samuel ANDERSON were married. Children were: John Riley ANDERSON, James ANDERSON, Lydia ANDERSON, Elizabeth ANDERSON, Jane ANDERSON, Henry ANDERSON.

Samuel ANDERSON was born about 1855 in Livingston Co., Missouri. Parents: George Washington ANDERSON and Elizabeth Jane LEEPER.Samuel ANDERSON was born on 27 January 1855 in Jackson Twp., Livingston, Missouri. He died on 15 February 1900 at the age of 45. He was buried in Springhill, Livingston, Missouri. Parents: Andrew ANDERSON and Catherine WARE.Samuel Jasper ANDERSON was born on 10 February 1884 in Alpha, Grundy, Missouri. He died in April 1948 at the age of 64. Parents: Samuel Washington ANDERSON and Rebecca Eleanor TODD.Samuel Washington ANDERSON was born on 18 June 1855 in Alpha, Grundy, Missouri. His death certificate shows a birth date of 18 Jun 1856. He died on 5 June 1925 at the age of 69 in Chillicothe Hospital, Livingston, Missouri. He was buried on 7 June 1925 in Alpha Cemetery, Grundy, Missouri. Parents: William L. ANDERSON Jr. and Nancy Jane LYDAY.

Spouse: Rebecca Eleanor TODD. Rebecca Eleanor TODD and Samuel Washington ANDERSON were married on 14 October 1874 in Grundy Co., Missouri. Children were: China Minerva ANDERSON, Paul Franklin ANDERSON, Samuel Jasper ANDERSON.

Sarah ANDERSON was born (date unknown).

Spouse: Michael Ray WILLARD. Sarah ANDERSON and Michael Ray WILLARD were married. Children were: Theresa WILLARD.

Sarah A. ANDERSON was born about 1841 in Missouri. Parents: George Washington ANDERSON and Elizabeth Jane LEEPER.Sarah Ann ANDERSON was born (date unknown). Parents: Allen Oscar "Nick" ANDERSON and Patricia Ann HOLLOWAY.

Spouse: GIPE. Sarah Ann ANDERSON and GIPE were married.
